subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: In [[Traditional Chinese]], the component on the left of U+79AE is {{l|mul|礻}}. In Korean [[hanja]] and Japanese [[kyūjitai]], the component on the left of U+79AE is {{l|mul|示}} rather than {{l|mul|礻}}, which is also the historical form that appears in the [[w:Kangxi dictionary|Kangxi dictionary]]. A [[w:CJK compatibility ideographs|CJK compatibility ideograph]] exists at U+F9B6 to reflect the form found in the Kangxi dictionary.

subSections.title: Descendants
subSections.text:

* {{l|ja|レ}} {{q|[[katakana|Katakana]] character derived from [[man'yōgana]]}}
